author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

It's Oliver's turn to revisit his personal favourite games of 2025 - and perhaps not surprisingly for a man with well over 400 games in his Switch 1 collection, it's Nintendo's brand-new console hybrid that completely dominates the selection. The Nintendo magic is strong in this line-up, augmented still further by the technical mastery of Shin'en Multimedia.

Visit the new Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 Introduction 
00:15 #5: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond
02:32 #4: Kirby Air Riders
04:48 #3: Fast Fusion 
07:39 #2: Donkey Kong Bananza
10:39 #1 …? 
15:12 Looking ahead to 2026
title: Digital Foundry Games of 2025: The Oliver Mackenzie "Switch 2 Edition"...!
